languages.text: {n}Упиваясь вашим {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}самоуничижением{/d}, Немезит не замечает как его палец чуть соскальзывает со спускового крючка.{/n} "Ты сам{mf||а} хочешь быть наказанн{mf|ым|ой}, я читаю это в тебе. Хорошо, ведь я — наказание".

{n}Relishing your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}self-disparagement{/d}, Nemesite does not notice his finger slowly slipping off the trigger.{/n} "You want to be punished. I can see it. Good, for I am your punishment."
languages.original_text: {n}Упиваясь вашим {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}самоуничижением{/d}, Немезит не замечает как его палец чуть соскальзывает со спускового крючка.{/n} "Ты сам{mf||а} хочешь быть наказанн{mf|ым|ой}, я читаю это в тебе. Хорошо, ведь я — наказание".

traits.locale_text: {n}Relishing your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}self-disparagement{/d}, Nemesite does not notice his finger slowly slipping off the trigger.{/n} "You want to be punished, I can see it. Good. For I am your punishment."

{n}Relishing your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}self-disparagement{/d}, Nemesite does not notice his finger slowly slipping off the trigger.{/n} "You want to be punished. I can see it. Good, for I am your punishment."

{n}Relishing your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}self-disparagement{/d}, Nemesite does not notice his finger slowly slipping off the trigger.{/n} "You want to be punished. I can see it. Good, for I am your punishment."

languages.text: {n}Während er deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Selbstherabsetzung{/d} genießt, bemerkt Nemesit nicht, wie sein Finger langsam vom Abzug gleitet.{/n} "Ihr wollt bestraft werden. Das sehe ich. Gut, denn ich bin Eure Bestrafung."
languages.original_text: {n}Relishing your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}self-disparagement{/d}, Nemesite does not notice his finger slowly slipping off the trigger.{/n} "You want to be punished. I can see it. Good, for I am your punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Während er deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Selbstherabsetzung{/d} genießt, bemerkt Nemesit nicht, wie sein Finger langsam vom Abzug gleitet.{/n} "Ihr wollt bestraft werden. Das sehe ich. Gut, denn ich bin Eure Bestrafung."

languages.text: {n}Némésite, trop occupé à se délecter de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}autodénigrement{/d}, ne se rend même pas compte que son doigt s'éloigne lentement de la gâchette.{/n} « Vous voulez être {mf|châtié|châtiée}. Je le sens. Tant mieux, car je suis votre châtiment. »
languages.original_text: {n}Relishing your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}self-disparagement{/d}, Nemesite does not notice his finger slowly slipping off the trigger.{/n} "You want to be punished. I can see it. Good, for I am your punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Némésite, trop occupé à se délecter de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}autodénigrement{/d}, ne se rend même pas compte que son doigt s'éloigne lentement de la gâchette.{/n} « Vous voulez être {mf|châtié|châtiée}. Je le sens. Tant mieux, car je suis votre châtiment. »

languages.text: {n}Disfrutando de tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}autocastigo{/d}, Nemesitio no se fija en que está aflojando el gatillo.{/n} «Quieres que te castiguen. Puedo verlo. Bien, porque yo soy ese castigo que anhelas».
languages.original_text: {n}Relishing your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}self-disparagement{/d}, Nemesite does not notice his finger slowly slipping off the trigger.{/n} "You want to be punished. I can see it. Good, for I am your punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Disfrutando de tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}autocastigo{/d}, Nemesitio no se fija en que está aflojando el gatillo.{/n} «Quieres que te castiguen. Puedo verlo. Bien, porque yo soy ese castigo que anhelas».

languages.text: {n}あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}自虐{/d}を愉しむネメサイトは、自分の指が引き金からゆっくりと外れつつあることに気づいていない。{/n}「罰されたいのだな。見ればわかる。いいだろう、俺がお前を罰してやろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Relishing your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}self-disparagement{/d}, Nemesite does not notice his finger slowly slipping off the trigger.{/n} "You want to be punished. I can see it. Good, for I am your punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}自虐{/d}を愉しむネメサイトは、自分の指が引き金からゆっくりと外れつつあることに気づいていない。{/n}「罰されたいのだな。見ればわかる。いいだろう、俺がお前を罰してやろう」

languages.text: {n}涅墨斯特享受着你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}自我贬低{/d}言论，完全没有注意到自己的手指正慢慢从扳机上滑落。{/n}“你渴望得到惩罚，我能看得出来。很好，因为我就是你的惩罚。”
languages.original_text: {n}Relishing your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}self-disparagement{/d}, Nemesite does not notice his finger slowly slipping off the trigger.{/n} "You want to be punished. I can see it. Good, for I am your punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}涅墨斯特享受着你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}自我贬低{/d}言论，完全没有注意到自己的手指正慢慢从扳机上滑落。{/n}“你渴望得到惩罚，我能看得出来。很好，因为我就是你的惩罚。”

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Kendini küçük görüşünün{/d} keyfine varan Nemezit, parmağının yavaşça tetikten kaydığını fark etmiyor.{/n} "Cezalandırılmak istiyorsun. Bunu görebilirim. İyi oldu. Ben de cezalandırma havamdaydım."
languages.original_text: {n}Relishing your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}self-disparagement{/d}, Nemesite does not notice his finger slowly slipping off the trigger.{/n} "You want to be punished. I can see it. Good, for I am your punishment."
